data.text: Wo Alatala matɔxɔ.
Alatala na gbilenfe Darisalamu ti ra,
a tɔɔrɔmixie ralimaniyama, a e rayalanma e xa fure kui.
Alatala tunbuie kɔnti kolon,
Won Marigi Alatala sɛnbɛ gbo,
Alatala mixi magoroxi bun tima,
Wo xa bɛɛti ba Alatala bɛ tantui ra,
A tan nan nuxui raminima koore ma,
A xurusee rabaloma,
Soe sɛnbɛ mu findixi fefe ra Ala bɛ.
Ala yaragaaxuiya nan nafanma a ma.
Darisalamu, i xa Alatala matɔxɔ.
barima a tan nan i xa naadɛ makantama,
A bɔɲɛsa fima i xa bɔxi ma,
Alatala duniɲa yamarima,
A balabalanyi ragoroma nɛ alɔ gɛsɛ fute,
A ragoro bɔxi ma, nde nɔma tide na xinbeli ya ra?
A na a xui ramini e ma, e xunuma nɛ,
Alatala bara Annabi Yaxuba rakolon a xa masenyi ra,
A mu na mɔɔli ragirixi si gbɛtɛ yo bɛ.
